title: Transfer Shocks: Bettiol joins Astana in Mid Season Switch, Fomer Ineos Chief Ellingworth to Bahrain Victorious
content:
Bettiol leaves EF Education-EasyPost after five and a half years, Ellingworth returns to Bahrain to focus on its Tour de France objectives.

Read the full article at Transfer Shocks: Bettiol joins Astana in Mid Season Switch, Fomer Ineos Chief Ellingworth to Bahrain Victorious on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
